name: mikroe.click.temphum17
short_description: Temp&Hum 17 Click is a compact add-on board that represents temperature and humidity sensing solutions. This board features the HS3001, a highly accurate, fully calibrated relative humidity and temperature sensor from Renesas. It features proprietary sensor-level protection, ensuring high reliability and long-term stability. Integrated calibration and temperature-compensation logic provides fully corrected RH and temperature values via standard I2C output. No user calibration of the output data is required.
